Reviews.Title: False Advertisement
Reviews.Author: Paul P. Brown
Reviews.Content: The TV that I bought for my mother was suppose to be a 3D TV like listed about.  What I got wasn't a 3D TV at all.  I'm hoping the box they sent my sister which doesn't show what type of TV is in fact a 3D TV.  I'm going to contact the Vender to see how they will make this right due to mailing this TV back would cost so much that I wouldn't be saving and wouldn't have a 40 inch TV, let alone the 3D TV I thought I had bought

Reviews.Title: Awesome quality and value
Reviews.Author: John Greathouse
Reviews.Content: Been using several Sansui TVs in the house for years and they are excellent quality. I highly recommend this brand.

ProductInfo.Features:
Tuner Integrated Digital Tuner (ATSC / QAM / NTSC). Digital TV Support Receives Over-the-Air DTV Broadcast Signals
Display Type Widescreen (16:9) Full HD. Native Panel Resolution 1920 x 1080. Signal Compatibility 1080p, 1080i, 720p, 480p, 480i
On Mode Power Consumption 142W. Contrast Ratio 10000:1. Response Time 4ms. Unit Color Black
ProductInfo.Name: Sansui HDLCD4060 40-Inch 1080p LED TV
